ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_01_10:
Pleasure to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Both people and Pokémon have so many
experiences in their lives.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_02_10: Be sure to face the day with a strong spirit.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_01_10:
I am often told I wake up earlier than anybody,
but the truth is it’s not by my own will.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_02_10:
In the Johto region, there is the Swine Pokémon
known as Piloswine...
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_03_10:
and it always comes to wake me in the morning,
by climbing onto me.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_04_10:
It’s quite heavy, and there are times when its
tusks start digging into me, too.
It can be rather dangerous.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_01_10:
If you find yourself awake early, why not
go for a walk?
ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_02_10:
I personally recommend a stroll along a beautiful
glacier. I find it very calming.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_01_10:
Both people and Pokémon go through much
suffering in order to become strong.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_02_10:
But that is what makes the joy of victory in a
Pokémon battle so sweet.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_03_10:
Just like how the warmth of spring is so joyous
after a harsh winter.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_01_10:
When you face true hardship, remember you
have friends and allies right beside you.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_02_10:
Your bonds with them are sure to lend
you strength.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, I placed Seel in serious danger,
all because of my own inexperience.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_02_10:
It was at the Seafoam Islands of the Kanto
region. Seel had collapsed. It was up to
me to save him, but...
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_03_10:
foolish as I was, I ended up losing
consciousness, too.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_04_10:
That is why I chose to learn from my mistakes
and became a teacher of harshness.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_01_10: Make sure you don’t end up like me, child.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_02_10:
Become strong, so that you can protect your
precious friends and Pokémon.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_01_10:
My age is catching up with me.
These days, my legs simply aren’t what they
used to be.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_02_10:
But as long as I have this cane—and the
company of my Pokémon—I will be just fine.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_03_10:
My Pokémon does more than just help me walk—
he bolsters my old heart as well.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_04_10:
I won’t be losing to young whippersnappers
anytime soon.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_03_10:
They are all my trusted allies.
I know they will support me no matter what.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_04_10:
As long as I have them by my side, I know I can
hold my own against any young Trainer.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_01_10:
I believe that the seasons represent a person’s life,
young [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_02_10:
After a hot summer, a calm autumn arrives, and
then the harsh winter. But once winter ends...
ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_03_10:
we are greeted by the warm spring.
We can withstand the harsh winter because we
know spring is coming.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_01_10:
Even when you are faced with harsh times, you
must persevere, trusting that spring will come.
ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_02_10:
It always does, without fail.
You must support your friends as they support
you—and wait for spring together.
ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this on my walk this morning.
Go on. You can have it.
ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_02_10:
It is more fitting for you to have it than I.
Keep it.
ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_01_10: I trust you will put it to the best use.
ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_02_10:
The way you use items is what matters.
Remember this, child...
ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_03_10: It is sure to be useful in your life.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], how are you doing
these days? You have a braver look than before.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_02_10:
Adventures teach you both fun and harshness.
That is why it is important to press onward—but
without arrogance.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_03_10:
Having all-out battles with other Trainers is
sure to give you the desire to improve.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_01_10:
I see you’ve gained a fair amount of experience.
And yet you have much to learn.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_02_10:
You are one of the more talented Trainers
I’ve met!
ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_03_10:
But that is why you must have discipline as well.
Never forget winter’s harshness, young one.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_01_10:
The trick to winning battles?
I wasn’t expecting such a question from you.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_02_10:
Knowing your opponent is important, of course,
but knowing your own Pokémon is far more so.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_03_10:
Understand your Pokémon’s characteristics, and
turn the tide of the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_04_10:
After that, it’s experience that decides who
wins and loses. Those who master the type
matchups master the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_01_10:
You’ve grown quite strong.
I think now you could survive even the harshest
of winters.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_02_10:
But remember, there are still many Trainers who
are far stronger than you. If you slack off from
battling, you will lose your skill.
ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope you become strong enough to someday
help teach others, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Is that really the time?
I’ve been up since five.
ch0032_00_yanagi/3002_0701_01_10:
It’s the beginning of a bright new day.
Let’s continue to do the best we can.
ch0032_00_yanagi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there! Sunny days like these help to
soften the harshness of winter, they do.
ch0032_00_yanagi/3004_0701_01_10: How are you? Are you giving it your all?
ch0032_00_yanagi/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening.
The day will soon be over. You’ve worked hard.
ch0032_00_yanagi/3006_0701_01_10:
And so another day passes. Be sure to treasure
the time you have tomorrow as well.
